attributes.action: Make LGBTQIA+ conversion therapy illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Recent groups on social media have been promoting conversion therapy to the LGBTQIA+ community. Being gay, lesbian, bisexual, transsexual and or how you identify is NOT a choice. Being part of the LGBTQIA+ community this deeply sickens me, and the government needs to take action to revoke this sickening “treatment”.
attributes.background:
Through this petition I want to achieve the following:
•Make it a criminal offence for anyone to try and or attempt conversion therapy on anyone in the LGBTQIA+ 
•Not allowing groups to promote conversion therapy
•Safeguarding the LGBTQIA+ community by introducing new legislation

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300976
